Key Match Events: Austin Wells drove in Gleyber Torres with a groundout in the first
Aaron Judge swiped third as part of a double steal and scampered home on catcher Christian Bethancourt’s throwing error
Post-Match Reflections: Nestor Cortes admitted he was upset when he learned he was going to pitch in relief. He said, 'I’m never going to back down from a challenge. I’m never going to leave my teammates out to dry. You’re always going to get my best effort no matter if I’m happy or not. That’s what I did today. I came out there and proved I can be put in any situation. From here on out, if that’s my role, I’ll accept it.'
Miscellaneous Highlights: Chicago (72-70) has lost four of five on a crucial homestand as it tries to rally in the race for the third NL wild card
Others: Gerrit Cole (6-3, 3.65 ERA) is slated to start for New York on Sunday on his 34th birthday. RHP Jameson Taillon (9-8, 3.66 ERA) takes the mound for Chicago in the finale of the weekend set.
